column4: hey guys, i need some help badly :( im installing Ubuntu for my Uncle's comp and gnome is hanging!
the install is all done and stuff, gdm loads, i log in, and i get a peach screen ebhind, mouse moves, but gnome doesnt load
its a brand new hoary install
when the computer boots up, you can interrupt it with ESC.
then you'll get a menu with boot options
add noapic and nolapic at the end
Just like we already did but instead of "noapic nolapic" put "acpi=force pci=noacpi" there in the end
